name: Negative Space (itch) (Vexed Programmer)
description:
Controls:
Movement - WASD / Mouse Look
Sprint - Left Shift
Jump - Space
Spawn Block - Left Click

Development: Everything was made in 3 hour by me, music was made using FLStudio.

Theme: Negative Space, I tried to have this in by using negative space to allow you to navigate without lots of details.

Gameplay: Try to get to the portal in each level by spawning in the blocks!
